title: settings
description: JSON schema for the configuration of Rave-Xplorer
overview: Currently Rave-Xplorer does not have any renderer specific settings. Since Rave-Xplorer is a Webcharts `chart` object, many default Webcharts settings are set in the [defaultSettings.js file](https://github.com/RhoInc/rave-Xplorer/blob/master/src/defaultSettings.js) as [described below](#webcharts-settings). Refer to the [Webcharts documentation](https://github.com/RhoInc/Webcharts/wiki/Chart-Configuration) for more details on these settings.

id_cols.title: Data Nesting
id_cols.description: the data will be summarized by each variable in this list

items.title: Variable Name
items.description: the name of the variable by which to nest the data

value_cols.title: CRF Flags
value_cols.description: binary flag variables that capture some status related to the case report form (CRF)

items.title: Variable Name
items.description: the name of the CRF status variable

filter_cols.title: Data Filters
filter_cols.description: variables in the data with which to filter the data

items.title: Variable Name
items.description: the name of the filter variable

display_cell_annotations.title: Display Cell Annotations
display_cell_annotations.description: displays cell annotations always or only on hover
